line_1: And not for Me, but You, She breath'd and liv'd.
line_2: From your Command her Motions She receiv'd;

line_1: In Times of Yore, an antient Baron liv'd;
line_2: Great Gifts bestow'd, and great Respect receiv'd.

line_1: For thee thy fond shepherdess liv'd,
line_2: For thee has she sorrow'd and griev'd;

line_1: Each Good that slept; for tho' it slept it liv'd,
line_2: Which like the Kind returning Spring reviv'd

line_1: And in the midst of this Destruction liv'd;
line_2: Cammilla, the only Daughter still surviv'd,

line_1: Such Mary's true love that has liv'd
line_2: See how they have safely surviv'd

line_1: One Day, I think, in Paradise He liv'd;
line_2: Scarce tasting Life, He was of Joy bereav'd:

line_1: In Camps, in Arms, in Pilgrimage, He liv'd;
line_2: His Voice scarce heard, his Dictates scarce believ'd,
